where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

from t_md_residential_area area,t_md_branch_scope scope where area.ID = scope.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_ID and scope.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
